I have the finest herbs in the village. What do you need?
You should try my special remedy for headaches!
Can you tell me about this place?: This village is known for its healing properties.
The woods nearby are full of rare plants.

Many have tried, but only a few have succeeded. Be cautious!
There's an ancient cave to the east that might hold secrets.
Do you have any stories to share?: I've seen many things in my time. Let me tell you about the old castle.
Ah, stories are like treasures; they are worth sharing!

What do you have for sale?: I can forge weapons, armor, and anything you need.
Come back when you have more materials!
Can you teach me about forging?: It's hard work but rewarding! I can show you the basics.
Only if you're ready to get your hands dirty!

Sure, what game?: Let's play hide and seek! I'll count to twenty.
How about a race? I bet I can beat you!
Okay! But if you change your mind, I'll be here!

Only authorized people can pass. Do you have a letter?
You may enter, but be on your best behavior!
Make sure to stay on the path. The woods are dangerous.
Do you have a permit to be in this area?

npcs.name: Fiona
npcs.description: An herbalist with knowledge of potions.

What kinds do you have?: I have healing herbs, potions, and even some rare ones!
You won't find better prices anywhere in the village.
Can you tell me about their uses?: These herbs can cure many ailments, from headaches to fatigue.
Let me know if you need something specific.

npcs.name: Graham
npcs.description: A merchant always looking to trade.

What are you selling?: Check out my wares; I have everything from tools to food.
You might find something rare among my goods!
Do you have any rare items?: I might have a few special items, but they come at a price.
Come back later; I might have something new.

npcs.name: Hannah
npcs.description: A traveler with tales to tell.

Yes, tell me about your travels!: I've crossed mountains and seas, and each place has its tales.
There are some lands filled with magic and mystery!
Ah, treasure can be found in stories too, but I understand.
Just be careful; the journey is just as important!

What kind of things?: Secrets of the woods, hidden treasures, and dark tales.
Would you like to hear a secret or perhaps a warning?
Do you have any advice for me?: Trust no one but yourself in this world.
Always keep your wits about you; danger lurks everywhere.

npcs.name: Jessica
npcs.description: A bard who loves to sing.

Yes, please!: This one's about heroes and their journeys.
How about a song of love and loss?
Fair enough! Let me know if you change your mind.
Music brightens even the darkest days.

npcs.name: Kevin
npcs.description: A scholar obsessed with ancient texts.

No, what's it about?: It's filled with knowledge of forgotten lands.
There are tales of great heroes and their struggles.
Yes, it was fascinating!: Isn't it amazing how history shapes our world?
There's so much to learn from the past.

Yes, please!: It's still warm from the oven, and it tastes amazing!
I also have pastries if you're interested.
No problem! Just remember, the best bread is fresh!
Come back anytime for a warm treat.

traders.name: Oliver *Trader*
traders.description: A seasoned merchant specializing in exotic goods.

What do you have in stock?: I’ve got rare spices, fabrics, and artifacts from distant lands.
You’ll never find a better deal for these exotic items!
Can you give me a discount?: Ah, you're a tough negotiator! How about a small discount?
Sorry, prices are firm, but you'll get the best quality.

items.name: Legendary Bow
items.description: A bow that shoots arrows with great precision.

traders.name: Helena *Trader*
traders.description: A trader with a collection of ancient scrolls and magical tomes.

Do you have magical scrolls?: I have scrolls with spells of fire, ice, and more.
You'll never find such rare knowledge elsewhere.
How much for a tome of ancient wisdom?: The price is steep, but the wisdom contained is priceless.
This knowledge could change your fate forever.

items.name: Scroll of Fireball
items.description: A scroll that casts a powerful fireball spell.

items.name: Tome of Wisdom
items.description: A tome filled with ancient knowledge makes you more experienced in fighting, making you stronger.

traders.name: Marcus *Trader*
traders.description: A blacksmith with a penchant for creating powerful weapons.

What can you make for me?: I can craft swords, axes, and more. Only the best for a warrior like you.
If you can pay, I can make it.
How about a discount for a fellow fighte: I'll knock a few coins off, but don't expect too much.
Sorry, friend, but these materials don't come cheap.

items.name: Iron Axe
items.description: A sturdy axe forged from iron.

items.name: Steel Sword
items.description: A finely crafted sword made of steel.

traders.name: Selena *Trader*
traders.description: An alchemist who deals in potions and elixirs.

What potions do you have?: I have potions for health, strength, and even invisibility.
These are brewed from the finest ingredients.
Can you make something special?: If you have the right materials, I can brew anything.
I could try, but it will cost extra.

items.name: Health Potion
items.description: A potion that restores a small amount of health.

items.name: Invisibility Elixir
items.description: An elixir that grants temporary invisibility.

traders.name: Gregor *Trader*
traders.description: A wandering trader known for his strange and unique wares.

What do you have for sale?: I have items you've never even heard of.
Unique wares for a discerning customer.
Why are your items so strange?: I travel far and wide to bring the unusual.
You won't find these in any ordinary market.

items.name: Phoenix Feather
items.description: A feather from a legendary Phoenix, said to revive the wearer.

traders.name: Bridget *Trader*
traders.description: A jeweler who crafts enchanted rings and necklaces.

What kind of enchantments?: I can craft rings that boost health, necklaces that enhance strength.
Can you customize a piece for me?: If you provide the materials, I can add any enchantment you like.
Customization is expensive, but it's worth it.

items.name: Ring of Vitality
items.description: A ring that boosts the wearer's health.

items.name: Necklace of Strength
items.description: A necklace that enhances the wearer's strength.

traders.name: Eldon *Trader*
traders.description: A traveling merchant who sells rare and unusual foods.

What do you have?: I have rare fruits and meats from far-off lands.
Exotic delicacies that you won’t find anywhere else.
Can you give me something to boost my en: I’ve got just the thing. A rare fruit that energizes the soul.

items.name: Dragon Fruit
items.description: A rare fruit that restores health and energy.

items.name: Phoenix Meat
items.description: A rare meat that is said to revive the eater.

traders.name: Isla *Trader*
traders.description: A potion master known for brewing rare and powerful potions.

What do you have for sale?: I have potions that can heal, strengthen, or even make you invisible.
My potions are made from rare ingredients.
Can I commission a custom potion?: I can brew anything, but it will cost you.
Bring me the right ingredients, and I can create something special.

items.name: Potion of Strength
items.description: A potion that temporarily boosts strength.

items.name: Elixir of Life
items.description: An elixir that restores most of your health.

traders.name: Jonah *Trader*
traders.description: A blacksmith with the finest weapons and armor in the land.

What can you craft for me?: I can forge weapons and armor fit for a king.
My gear will make you the strongest warrior in the land.
Can I trade in my old gear?: I’ll give you a fair price for your old equipment.
I can always use spare parts.

items.name: Mithril Armor
items.description: Armor made of Mithril, providing exceptional protection, increasing your health.

items.name: Obsidian Dagger
items.description: A dagger made of obsidian, sharp and deadly.
